resources.string:
Quakes NZ was built in Wellington, New Zealand by Leandro Peralta and Daniel Watts.

Leandro Peralta - Developer
leandro.peralta@live.com.ar

Daniel Watts - Designer
daniel@wattscreative.me

We would like to thank the following organisations for providing the awesome data used within this app.

geonet.org.nz
The New Zealand GeoNet project and its sponsors EQC, GNS Science and LINZ.

civildefence.govt.nz
The Ministry of Civil Defence and Emergency Management.
